trans-unit.source: Enables the sharing of contextual information, such as property validation, parent activity, and so on, across validators during the compilation process.
trans-unit.target: Permite que a partilha de nível contextual das informações, como validação de propriedade, atividade principal e assim sucessivamente, entre validações durante o processo de compilação.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the ValidationManager class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial relativamente a uma instância da classe ValidationManager, consulte o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"></xref> class using the identified service provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"> </xref> classe utilizando o fornecedor de serviço identificados.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager> class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial relativamente a uma instância do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>classe, consulte o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that locates a GUID identified service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IServiceProvider>que localiza um serviço GUID identificado.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"></xref> class using the identified service provider and indicates whether child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager"> </xref> classe utilizando o fornecedor de serviço identificados e indica se subordinado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> classes devem ser validadas.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values regarding an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager> class, see the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial relativamente a uma instância do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>classe, consulte o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationManager>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that locates a GUID identified service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IServiceProvider>que localiza um serviço GUID identificado.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to validate the child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para validar o subordinado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> classes de atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the stack object that a validator can use to make information available to nested validators.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o objeto de pilha que pode utilizar um validador para disponibilizar informações validações aninhadas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"></xref> that a validator can use to make information available to nested validators.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack"> </xref> que um validador pode utilizar para disponibilizar informações aninhada validações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de serviço do <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> especificado

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the <xref:System.Type> of service object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que especifica o <xref:System.Type>de objecto de serviço a obter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A service object of type serviceType, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de serviço do tipo serviceType , ou uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic) se não houver nenhum objecto de serviço do tipo serviceType .

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of validators that are associated with a type by looking up the validator attribute applied on the type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma matriz de validações que estão associados um tipo ao procurar o atributo de validação aplicado no tipo.

trans-unit.source: If the hash table of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes contains the <xref:System.Type> indicated by `type`, an array of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se a tabela hash de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>contém classes a <xref:System.Type>indicado pelo `type`, uma matriz de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>classes é devolvido.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>

trans-unit.source: If the hash table does not contain the <xref:System.Type> indicated by `type`, a new hash table of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is created and then an array of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se a tabela hash não contém o <xref:System.Type>indicado pelo `type`, uma nova tabela hash de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>classes é criado e, em seguida, uma matriz do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator>classes é devolvido.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> class to find.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"> </xref> classe localizar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"> </xref> classes.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se subordinado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> classes devem ser validadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> classes should be validated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se subordinado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> classes devem ser validado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
